name: XQuery-indentomnicompleteftplugin
description: Scripts to make Vim a little more efficient at editing XQuery...!
install_details:
1.  Copy ftplugin/xquery.vim to ~/.vim/ftplugin
  2.  Copy autoload/xquerycomplete.vim to ~/.vim/autoload
  3.  Copy indent/xquery.vim to ~/.vim/indent/xquery.vim 
  4.  Copy _ctags to ~/.ctags (or one of the alternatives at http://ctags.sourceforge.net/ctags.html#FILES)
  5.  Download Exuberant Ctags and put it on your path.  Use &#039ctags -R&#039 to build a tags file for your XQuery source folder
